name: erclwwlkrel
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1
body: -| wceq(c0, copab(s0, s1, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cclwwlk, c1)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cclwwlk, c1)), wrex(s2, co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), ccsh, cv(s2)))))))
bodyPretty: ⊣ c0 = { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ∈(ClWWalks ` c1)∧ s1 ∈(ClWWalks ` c1)∧ ∃(s2 ∈(0[...](# ` s1)), s0 =(s1[cyclShift]s2)))}
